data.title: Time to my birthday party!
data.solution:
from datetime import datetime as x
w,i,t=lambda t:x.strptime(t,'%H:%M:%S %d/%m/%Y'),input,lambda x:['s',''][x==1]
q=w(i())-w(i())
d,s=q.days,q.seconds
print('%d week%s %d day%s %d hour%s %d minute%s %d second%s'%(d/7,t(d/7),d%7,t(d%7),s/3600,t(s/3600),s%3600/60,t(s%3600/60),s%3600%60,t(s%3600%60)))
data.statement: Today's date is [[today]] and my birthday is [[mybirthday]]. How many weeks, days, hours, minutes and seconds is it until my birthday?

testCases.title: Just getting ready for the party!

data.constraints:
[[today]] < [[mybirthday]]
1900 <= year([[today]]), year([[mybirthday]]) <= 2050
1 <= month([[today]]), month([[mybirthday]]) <= 12
1 <= day([[today]]), day([[mybirthday]]) <= 31
0 <= hour([[today]]), hour([[mybirthday]]) <= 23
0 <= minute([[today]]), minute([[mybirthday]]) <= 59
0 <= seconds([[today]]), seconds([[mybirthday]]) <= 59

0 <= week(output) <= 10000
0 <= day(output) <= 6
0 <= hour(output) <= 23
0 <= minute(output) <= 59
0 <= seconds(output) <= 59
data.stubGenerator:
read mybirthday:string(19)
read today:string(19)
write Time until birthday
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1 :>> My birthday's date: [[mybirthday]] in format "HH:MM:SS dd/mm/yyyy"
<<Line 2 :>> Today's date: [[today]] in format "HH:MM:SS dd/mm/yyyy"
data.outputDescription: <<Line 1 :>> Weeks, days, hours, minutes and seconds to my birthday in format: "w weeks d days H hours M minutes S seconds" (Units are in plural for values different than 1: "0 hours 1 minute 20 seconds")

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Today's date is today and my birthday is mybirthday. How many weeks, days, hours, minutes and seconds is it until my birthday?
Input
Line 1 : My birthday's date: mybirthday in format "HH:MM:SS dd/mm/yyyy"
Line 2 : Today's date: today in format "HH:MM:SS dd/mm/yyyy"
Output
Line 1 : Weeks, days, hours, minutes and seconds to my birthday in format: "w weeks d days H hours M minutes S seconds" (Units are in plural for values different than 1: "0 hours 1 minute 20 seconds")
Constraints
today < mybirthday
1900 <= year(today), year(mybirthday) <= 2050
1 <= month(today), month(mybirthday) <= 12
1 <= day(today), day(mybirthday) <= 31
0 <= hour(today), hour(mybirthday) <= 23
0 <= minute(today), minute(mybirthday) <= 59
0 <= seconds(today), seconds(mybirthday) <= 59

0 <= week(output) <= 10000
0 <= day(output) <= 6
0 <= hour(output) <= 23
0 <= minute(output) <= 59
0 <= seconds(output) <= 59
Example
Input
15:31:02 01/05/2022
12:00:01 01/05/2022
Output
0 weeks 0 days 3 hours 31 minutes 1 second
